actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Upper Mississippi River Management Act of 1986 to extend the amounts authorized for an additional year without increasing the total amounts authorized.

summary.text: Amends the Upper Mississippi River Management Act of 1986 to extend authorized appropriations for certain water development resource programs and recreational projects from ten years to 11 years without increasing the total amounts authorized, by authorizing 11th-year appropriations in the amount of the aggregate differences between the amounts authorized and the amounts appropriated for the preceding ten years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Upper Mississippi River Management Act of 1986 to extend the amounts authorized for an additional year without increasing the total amounts authorized.
